posts.post_content:
After a little glimpse into the T206 world, I have decided that it isn't for me.  All of these but one came from other board members.  I am not profiteering here, just trying to recoup the money to put toward another recent purchase.  All prices include delivery via Paypal Friends and Family.  Thanks!

Bescher (name on top and bottom)  $60
Beck sold
Seymour $20
Willett sold
Dots Miller SGC 40  sold

Take the remaining pair $70 obo
Please email me directly at [url]rchilders1973@gmail.com[/url]
Bump for some marked as sold and price reductions on the remaining two.  I am motivated to sell and will listen to offers.  Please email directly at [url]rchilders1973@gmail.com[/url]
